content: विरुच् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To shine, be resplendent; <ls>R. 6. 5</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 14</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 66.</ls> {@--2@} To be eminent or conspicuous. {@--3@} To become visible, appear. {@--4@} To illuminate, brighten (<ab>P.</ab>). {@--5@} To please, delight. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To irradiate, illuminate. {@--2@} To delight in. {@--3@} To sport with.
